description: Schema for store policies capability (dev.ocp.store.policies@1.0), providing URLs to various store policies.

returnPolicy.description: URL to the store's return policy.

privacyPolicy.description: URL to the store's privacy policy.

termsOfService.description: URL to the store's terms of service.

shippingPolicy.description: URL to the store's shipping policy.

refundPolicy.description: URL to the store's refund policy.

accessibilityPolicy.description: URL to the store's accessibility policy.

cookiePolicy.description: URL to the store's cookie policy.

contactPolicy.description: URL to the store's contact or support policy.

dataPolicy.description: URL to the store's data privacy policy, used for user consent in orders.
